title: Golf at the 1994 Asian Games
text:
<a href="Golf">Golf</a> was one of the many sports which was held at the <a href="1994%20Asian%20Games">1994 Asian Games</a> in <a href="Hiroshima">Hiroshima</a>, <a href="Japan">Japan</a> between 6 and 9 October 1994.
Participating nations.
A total of 61 athletes from 12 nations competed in golf at the 1994 Asian Games:
